entry.title: Combined summary - [ANN] Bitcoin-seeder v0.1
entry.summary: Pieter has released version 0.1.0 of his bitcoin-seeder program on Github. The program powers the DNS seed on seed.bitcoin.sipa.be and is a crawler for the Bitcoin network, with an integrated DNS server. However, the program only has minimal functionality at this point, with some features such as logging, configuration options, and daemonization still missing.Despite this, Pieter's node has been running the program without any issues for over a week, prompting him to release it. He encourages users to provide feedback and ask questions regarding the program's development. The program regularly dumps its database in dnsseed.dat, allowing for fast reinitialization. However, Pieter cautions that as the program is far from finished, compatibility with future versions cannot be guaranteed.
